website_summaries.verdict: The ELAC Debut F5 tower speaker delivers astonishing performance for the price.
pros: The ELAC Debut F5 offers excellent floorstander performance for half the price of some competitors
The speakers sport attractive styling and decent build quality
A whole surround package will only set you back $1,500, which is less than some sound bars
cons: The Debut F5 is only available in a black, vinyl finish

customer_reviews.title: Great sound from a footprint not as deep as rivals.
customer_reviews.text: Most of my home speakers are Klipsch, but I needed a profile that would hug closer to the wall. I took a chance on ELAC based on reviews and the smaller footprint I needed. The sound is great, at least rivaling my Klipsch at an equivalent price. Be sure your receiver can handle 6 ohms speakers...most can. Some, like my Yamaha, have a menu switch to change from the default 8 ohm setting. One Year Update: They still sound great after one year. I can hear things in some tracks that I've missed with other speakers. I would buy another pair if I need to replace more Klipsch's.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: A Remarkable Speaker System!
customer_reviews.text: The Elac F5's are designed and engineered to perform far beyond their price point creating sound reproduction that is full range, dynamic, extended with marvelous imaging. Andrew Jones has set a new standard. These speakers let the listener enter the realm of musical enjoyment with an almost a seductive quality. These are my new standard.
customer_reviews.author: Marva G Kubalik

customer_reviews.title: BAD BOYS, BAD BOYS, WHATCHA GOING TO DO....
customer_reviews.text: I'm using these bad boys as my front channel speakers through a Marantz SR5010 receiver. I've got the ELAC C5 in the middle and then some Def Tech ProMonitor 800's for the rears and then a SVS PB-1000 on the low end. In stereo mode, these F5's rock the music. Love these F5's for music. For Movies, these F5's aren't slouches. The movie experience in my home is near nirvana.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Kimura

customer_reviews.title: Wide range of sound reproduction, attractive design, pleasure to listen to
customer_reviews.text: Attractive and wide ranging, with these are flexible and high fidelity. The sheer clarity of this set actually reveals musical details which do not come through with lower quality speakers. I will occasionally forget to turn on my subwoofer, and for many shows and movies, I can't even tell. I absolutely recommend for audiophiles who can't afford the money for better.
customer_reviews.author: PaintswithWords

customer_reviews.title: I do like the sound of these speakers a lot
customer_reviews.text: When one of my speakers arrived, the corner was crushed. I do like the sound of these speakers a lot, but they are very large and heavy, way more than I expected. I don't know if I can lift this speaker again to return it. Also, since it was a private seller, I don't know if return shipping is covered, not to mention that these were the only two the seller had. I would be careful ordering these if you can't lift heavy things (or if your postmen and/or women tend to drop heavy things on their corners).
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: ... up these speakers this week end and they sound amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I hooked up these speakers this week end and they sound amazing !!!! Used Multi-Channel Acoustic Calibration System (MCACC) from my Pioneer VSX-80 and did several test with movies, music and just regular TV and everything sounds like crystal clear. If you do not want break the bank, these speakers are a bargain in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: gael

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sound For Only $550 per Pair!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound for only $550 per pair. The newer UF-5 - at $998 per pair - is even more amazing for the money, but they weren't on the market yet when I bought my F5's.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur J.

customer_reviews.title: The best value out there for full range speakers
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for an inexpensive upgrade for your music or home theater setup these are the best value out there. They sound amazing for the price and rival speakers costing over $1000 each.
customer_reviews.author: Dredd

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent clarity and musicality. Another Andrew Jones triumph! (I had the Andrew Jones designed Pioneer floor standers, and liked them, but these provide more clarity and definition.) Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Novalis

customer_reviews.title: Sound great
customer_reviews.text: These sound excellent for a modest price. Comes with isolation pins for the base. Compared to my older speakers these way more clearer, next receiver upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger62651

customer_reviews.title: I'm not an audiophile but I do know what sounds good to me
customer_reviews.text: WOW!!! I'm not an audiophile but I do know what sounds good to me, and these speakers are amazing. I have a difficult room to set up, so I know that I may not be getting the best sound but they are very clear and powerful. I hear sound and detail during music that I have not heard before. Buy these and you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Laurence D.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT IMAGING
customer_reviews.text: Rated very high with crystal sound...give it some time to adjust and you will be inspired
customer_reviews.author: RJW Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Great Sound! I'm really please so far. The highs are crisp and high-to-midrange balance is excellent as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bill K.

customer_reviews.title: 6 ohm speakers
customer_reviews.text: great sound, large and detailed sound easy to tip over
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Donna

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: I don't think you can beat elac for the money, period. For music, you likely do not even need a sub, for movies you will need a sub. The highs are killer, the clarity is definitive. These are good enough to benefit from premium speaker cables, just as an FYI. You'll hear a difference when you get these, and you'll hear more of a difference if you get some premium cables.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Smith

customer_reviews.title: Andrew Jones is a genius! Buy these Debut F5 speakers!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received my new Elac Debut F5 tower speakers yesterday. I set it up right away and love the sound. These speakers are the best I've ever owned, hands down the BEST. I'm not a expert, but I know good sound and these are great! I've now watched several action movies on HBO to test the sound, wow! Andrew Jones is a genius!!!! Buy these speakers!
customer_reviews.author: GP

customer_reviews.title: Good at any price.
customer_reviews.text: High fidelity, easy to drive, nice design, and a small foot print.
customer_reviews.author: ihs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with purchase. Clear and strong. Can't beat price point
customer_reviews.author: Doug Pletz

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: These speakers were within my budget and far exceed what I expected. Coupled with the new AVR, ELAC center speaker and the ELAC Atmos speakers, I now prefer my home theater sound over going to the movies.
customer_reviews.author: hardway

customer_reviews.title: way worth its value.
customer_reviews.text: this babe is amazing, out beat my $4000 Harbeth speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy Y.

customer_reviews.title: Good listening
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound for the cost and size. Bass is better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: jsr

customer_reviews.title: These speakers are amazing. I had been researching them for some time
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are amazing. I had been researching them for some time. Ended up getting two F5's, pair of B5's, C5, and the S12EQ. I am going to be purchasing the Amos speakers to go on top of the F5's in the coming months. There are very few speakers at this price range that will preform as well as these.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Casing is nice, but I believe will scratch a bit easier ...
customer_reviews.text: Clean precise sound for the money. Casing is nice, but I believe will scratch a bit easier than you'd expect, so be mindful of that. Other than that, hook them up correctly and then listen to some of your favorite music.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAwesome

customer_reviews.title: Incredible sound for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Incredible sound for the price -- makes speakers costing several times more sound thin. The sound is complete, not tinny or lacking in any area. At very high volumes it does break up a little, but no one would play them at that volume. After testing this unit, I ordered a second one and I am replacing my two front speakers in my home theater. Sneaky, send one for review and you are so excited you have to order the second one :) . Very well made, note that these are heavy units and you'll need a friend to help unbox.
customer_reviews.author: DZRhino

customer_reviews.title: Quality Issues
customer_reviews.text: Still breaking the ELAC Debut F5 Tower speakers at moderate sound levels, and they sound quite good; natural sounding with very little coloration. My problem right now is the build quality! The black lamination is loose and peeling in a few spots. Of the two F5 Tower speakers that I received,one was wrapped in plastic that looked as though it had been used a number of times. The styrofoam bloaking was in pieces, even though the shipping carton did not show signs of obvious damage. I'm having a bad case of buyer's remorse, hoping that I did not make the wrong choice for a new speaker system.
customer_reviews.author: Cindyc

customer_reviews.title: Decent sound, but my cheap old Paradigms are better...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these thinking they would be a pretty sizable improvement over my $230 12 year old Paradigm Titan v3s. With the switcher and decent quality cable in A/B testing with 4 other people and several styles of music, the Paradigms blew these away in every category. Unanimously! I'm not saying these are bad speakers, they are decent for the price, but if they are worse than the pair you're replacing, then why bother? I didn't, and back they went.
customer_reviews.author: G. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great Value Speaker!
customer_reviews.text: Running these with a Rotel RA-970BX. Thay sound great. Was looking at Klipsh R series as well. Was worried my little amp wouldn't have the juice to run the them, so I bought these. Also. I own some Paradigm Reference Studio 100s powered by a Krell/Denon combo. The ELACs don't sound as good as them, but for 1/4 the price, the value is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Neel Parmar

customer_reviews.title: Upgraded from some nice Advents. I cant believe how great these sound
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from some nice Advents. I cant believe how great these sound, especially for the price. Easily compares with Speakers 4x the price.
customer_reviews.author: PT

customer_reviews.title: Quality speakers for half of what I'd expect them to cost given the sound
customer_reviews.text: I have another pair of Andrew Jones designed speakers so I didn't go into this wondering if I'd be impressed (not from ELAC but Pioneer) -- you know you're getting quality when he's the designer even before you open the box. The sounds coming from the speaker are clear and the bass coming from the speaker is perfect. Honestly it sounds like a speaker I'd feel like would cost twice as much than the price they're asking for. If you're looking for a decently priced amazing speaker then look no further. You won't be disappointed if you get them.
customer_reviews.author: T.L.

customer_reviews.title: The heaviest home speakers I have ever seen
customer_reviews.text: These speakers sound awesome and are exceptional quality. I am not an audiophile so I cannot tell you specifically how amazing these are, but they sound wonderful to me and can get LOUD. Moreover, they weigh a TON! There is a special hook on the back of the speaker so you can attach it to a wall to prevent it from tipping over. You will want to use that because these would not be sturdy if someone or some child bumped into it. With how heavy these are, someone would get seriously hurt if they fell over.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonLover

product_meta.title: ELAC (DF51-BK) - Debut F5 Tower Speakers (Each)
product_meta.description: With its custom drivers and floor standing design, the Debut F5 is a great choice for a serious two- channel rig or as the nucleus of a multi-channel setup. Add a Debut powered subwoofer and you have a serious, full-range system that delivers sound that's in the big league.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars66 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
